mapper.delete: delete from post where idx=#{idx} and userid=#{userid}
mapper.select: SELECT p.idx, p.userid, m.user_image, p.category,sub_title, title, content, header_image, reg_date FROM post p INNER JOIN member m ON p.userid=m.userid WHERE p.idx=#{value}
SELECT p.idx, p.userid, m.user_image, p.category,sub_title, title, content, header_image, reg_date FROM post p INNER JOIN member m ON p.userid=m.userid WHERE p.idx=#{idx} AND p.userid=#{userid}
mapper.update: update post set read_cnt = read_cnt+1 where idx=#{value}
